title: Roasted Greek Lemon Potatoes Recipe
description: These Greek lemon potatoes, with olive oil, lemon juice, and broth, are roasted until crisp and golden outside, tender and soft inside.

About Us The Allrecipes Allstars How to Add a Recipe GET THE MAGAZINE Recipes Side Dish Potato Roasted Potato Recipes Roasted Greek Lemon Potatoes 4.8 (313) 227 Reviews 25 Photos These Greek potatoes are surprisingly delicious! They're roasted in a flavorful lemon and herb broth until golden and tender inside. Submitted by koko Updated on March 27, 2025 Tested by Allrecipes Test Kitchen Tested by Allrecipes Test Kitchen The Allrecipes Test Kitchen staff are a team of culinary pros who make and vet recipes using only equipment you'd find in a home kitchen. Staff credentials vary but include training at the Culinary Institute of America; kitchen stints in fine dining restaurants; and countless hours in the test kitchen itself. Meet the Allrecipes Test Kitchen Save Rate Print Share Add Photo 25 25 25 25 Prep Time: 15 mins Cook Time: 1 hr Total Time: 1 hr 15 mins Servings: 6 Jump to Nutrition Facts Cook Mode (Keep screen awake) Ingredients 1x 2x 4x Oops! Something went wrong. Our team is working on it. Original recipe (1X) yields 6 servings 3 pounds potatoes, peeled and cut into thick wedges ⅓ cup olive oil 2 medium lemons, juiced 2 teaspoons salt 1 teaspoon oregano ½ teaspoon ground black pepper 3 cups chicken broth Directions Gather all ingredients. Preheat the oven to 400 degrees F (200 degrees C). Dotdash Meredith Food Studios Put potato wedges in a large bowl. Drizzle with olive oil and lemon juice and toss to coat. Season with salt, oregano, and black pepper; toss again to coat. Dotdash Meredith Food Studios Spread potato wedges in a single layer in a 2-inch-deep pan. Pour chicken broth over potatoes. Dotdash Meredith Food Studios Roast potatoes in the preheated oven until tender, crispy, and golden, about 1 hour. Dotdash Meredith Food Studios Enjoy! Dotdash Meredith Food Studios Cook’s Note Alternately, you could roast the potatoes in a foil pan on the grill for 30 to 40 minutes.They're a great complement to souvlaki. All you need is a great Greek salad for a full meal! I Made It Print 664 home cooks made it! Your daily values may be higher or lower depending on your calorie needs. ** Nutrient information is not available for all ingredients. Amount is based on available nutrient data. (-) Information is not currently available for this nutrient. If you are following a medically restrictive diet, please consult your doctor or registered dietitian before preparing this recipe for personal consumption. Add Your Photo Photos of Roasted Greek Lemon Potatoes 01 of 25 Photo by  Dotdash Meredith Food Studios 02 of 25 Photo by  AIB 04/20/2021 03 of 25 Photo by  Jennifer Willey 12/31/2020 04 of 25 Photo by  Katherine 09/14/2020 Reduced the salt by 1/3 and doubled the oregano. Delicious! Perfect texture and lemon flavor. 05 of 25 Photo by  hilrevoe 07/14/2020 06 of 25 Photo by  ToniosMom 04/29/2020 I only had red potatoes so i used them came out great! 07 of 25 Photo by  Kristie Georgis 04/20/2020 08 of 25 Photo by  Ann 12/02/2019 These potatoes are very tasty - quite similar to the potatoes at our favorite local Greek restaurant. I had to make a few substitutions ... used Wylers Chicken granules to make the broth (I think it made the potatoes a tiny bit too salty but I was out of Swanson's). I roasted it for 40 minutes at 400 and then an additional 15 minutes at 450 to use up the liquid. The Yukon Gold potatoes began to get those beautiful golden brown edges. My husband loved them. 09 of 25 Photo by  Grace Witjaksono 09/02/2019 I like it, but I would cut the lemon from 2 to 1. I found out tonight that juice from 2 lemons made my potatoes too tangy and acidic. 10 of 25 Photo by  Purple Panda Chow Mom 04/20/2019 My ex-husband is Greek and I really miss the food! These are amazing! I added carrots to mine. 1 2 3 Next You’ll Also Love Greek-Style Lemon Potatoes 7 Ratings Feta Roasted Potatoes 4 Ratings Laura's Lemon Roasted Potatoes 267 Ratings Herbed Greek Roasted Potatoes with Feta Cheese 239 Ratings Greek Garlic-Lemon Potatoes Recipe 108 Ratings Oven-Roasted Greek Potatoes 97 Ratings Lemon-Garlic Roasted Potatoes 4 Ratings Greek Lemon Chicken and Potato Bake 884 Ratings Garlic, Lemon, and Herb Greek-Style Potatoes 30 Ratings Lemon-Garlic Potato Wedges Roasted Lemon-Garlic Potato Wedges 6 Ratings Fondant Potatoes 313 Ratings Dijon Roasted Potatoes 39 Ratings Roasted Rosemary Onion Potatoes 62 Ratings Roasted Lemon-Pepper Potatoes 93 Ratings Roasted Lemon-Garlic Potatoes 6 Ratings Allrecipes Newsletters Follow Us Dinners Meals Ingredients Occasions Cuisines Kitchen Tips News Features About Us Editorial Process Privacy Policy Product Vetting Terms of Service Advertise Careers Contact Your Privacy Choices   Allrecipes is part of the Dotdash Meredith publishing family.
